title: New and improved: Joebob graphics website
content:
Hi all,

even though friday the thirteenth might not be the ideal date to launch a new website, I just did so anyway: [www.joebob.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014102359/http:/www.joebob.nl/ "www.joebob.nl")

Since it's all about fonts I'd really like the visitors of this forum to comment and share your thoughts with me.

Thanks for your time,  
Joe
author: Joebob

comments.content: Cute idea. FYI, the text overflows the etch-a-sketch on most pages.

Jeroen, the Etch-a-sketch interface is the best thing I've yet seen on the internet. You have finally succeeded in creating the perfect website. Dead brilliant! Four and a half stars.

j a m e s

Thanks for the compliment James, and to aluminum: what browser do you use and on what platform?

Thanks again,  
Joe

"what browser do you use and on what platform?"

The issue is that my font size is set slightly larger than the norm...it's not a browser issue. Here's a screen shot:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014102359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/joejob_5815.jpg)
Ok, I see what you mean now. Thanks for letting me know.
